moduleMetadataJson.name: Multi Gather Run Shell Command Resource File
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module will read shell commands from a resource file and
          execute the commands in the specified Meterpreter or shell session.
author: Carlos Perez <carlos_perez@darkoperator.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: RESOURCE
options.description: Full path to resource file to read commands from.
